name: Digital portfolio
tagline: Designy side projects from a busy software developer.
body: ## Welcome to my creative side! I am a software developer in Portland, Oregon, and am looking for ways to bring more art into my daily life. I have studied drawing and painting, art history, dance, and theater. I have also discovered that software is an amazingly creative medium. Here are a few of my latest projects. ### [Virtual Playbill](https://virtual-playbill.herokuapp.com/signin) I am tracking my theater attendance and will be revamping the data model this year to allow for multiple user collections. ### Infographics Using an online tool called [Canva](https://www.canva.com/), I have been playing around with infographics. ### Notes I am playing with typography and space utilization as I take notes in meetings and reading sessions. (image to come) ### Tap Dance Check me out in my first dance show in Montreal: [Disc-O-Tap](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hPKYIwtYkOk)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
